    CloudComputing desertHydro-Template Elevation Adjustments in Stream_Networks watershedWorkflow

    Hydrological pre-processing workflow for digital elevation models

    flow_accumlation_wb.Rd

    Hydrological pre-processing workflow for digital elevation models

    Usage

    flow_accumlation_wb(
  dem_file_path,
  ModelFolder,
  watershed_shape_path = NA,
  max_dist = 1000,
  stream_threshold = 1200,
  carve = 1,
  overwrite = T
)

    Arguments

    dem_file_path

    path to digital elevation file

    ModelFolder

    Output path to save model outputs

    watershed_shape_path

    Optional shapefile to clip the resulting results

    max_dist

    numeric value in meters to breach the digital elevation model

    stream_threshold

    Flow accumulation number (cells) to create channels

    carve

    numeric. Number of meters to carve the channel network down by.

    overwrite

    T/F. If TRUE, the model will overwrite previous files in Model Folder

    Value

    SpatRaster of the modified digital elevation model

    Examples

    ModelFolder <- tempdir() # Create a temporary directory to save files into
